reviews.review_msg: Mandana is a very professional human being. She has a strong personality that stands out when she is working. Not only is she a good speaker but her level of expertise is clear that shows her effort of not only teaching but also guiding her students in all ways of learning. She is also very representable, and she has a great taste of fashion.
She is the worst prof in SFU. Never help students to solve questions.

Really nice prof, tries to make lectures engaging. Straightforward class, and very easy. Mostly common sense stuff. Attend lecture cause her slides are fill in the blank style. Read the book and you're golden. Easy assignments. Easy weekly quizzes. MT's straightforward. Really wants students to succeed, and very helpful and approachable! GPA boost.
Had her for Kin 140 last fall. Nice teacher and all. Nothing much to say, her class was relatively easy. She does make you memorize specific points from the text.
